lead_paragraph: The path to the Olympics is paved with potholes for many athletes but few can claim to have overcome hardship like wrestler Vinod Kumar, who was thrown from a speeding train by a rival's family in India before landing on his feet in Australia.

headline.print_headline: Wrestler Kumar on Track for Rio After Thrown From Train
headline.main: Wrestler Kumar on Track for Rio After Thrown From Train
